tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterUsageData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  time TIME,
  sensor_id INT,
  water_usage DECIMAL,
  soil_moisture DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Irrigation_Logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    field_area DECIMAL,
    water_used DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE WaterConsumption (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Date DATE,
    Time TIME,
    UsageInLiters INT
)

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSystem (
    SystemID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Location VARCHAR(255),
    Type VARCHAR(50),
    Efficiency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    WeatherID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Date DATE,
    Temperature FLOAT,
    Humidity FLOAT,
    Precipitation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE FarmFields (
    FieldID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Location VARCHAR(255),
    SoilType VARCHAR(50),
    AreaInAcres FLOAT
)
